adapters.name: adapter-automation_gateway
adapters.overview: Adapter that connects to Itential Automation Gateway

capabilities.capability: Removes flow test configuration on Cisco IOS device over Itential Automation Gateway
Archives and then deletes device from Kentik

inputs.name: deviceName
inputs.description: Name of device to delete from Kentik

inputs.name: kentikAdapter
inputs.description: Name of Kentik adapter to use for the job

name: Device Onboarding - Reset - Kentik - Example
overview: Automation removes flow test Cisco IOS device configuration and deletes device from Kentik to reset data for Device Onboarding - Kentik - Example automation
